description: Fixing and maintaining your own bike is really rewarding. Being able to look after your own equipment and keep it running smoothly will make your riding much more enjoyable, and even save you money! However, if you've never worked on a bike before, it may seem quite daunting - but it needn't be! In this new mini series, Alex gives you a crash course in bike maintenance, so you can work on your bike with confidence! If you're keen to get into home mechanics, this is a great place to start! Subscribe to GCN+ for cycling as you have never seen it before! LIve racing, shows & cycling adventure films: https://gcn.eu/plus Subscribe: http://gcntech.co/subscribetogcntech Pick up your copy of our maintenance book over at The GCN Shop: https://gcn.eu/5F3 #Cycling #GCN #GCNTech #RoadBike Let us know what you thought of our new Crash Course series in the comments below! description: Caffeine is the worlds most popular psychoactive drug, and is enjoyed by many of us in things like tea, coffee, and energy gels. A proven ergogenic aid, caffeine was actually on the WADA banned substances list for a period of time! In this video, Ollie dons his science glasses and explains what caffeine actually is, and how it can enhance your cycling performance. Subscribe to GCN+ for cycling as you have never seen it before! title: How Does Caffeine Affect Cycling Performance?

description: When cycling with other bike riders, drafting can save you loads of energy. Sheltering from the wind on another cyclist's wheel can reduce the amount of power you need to produce by up to 50%! In this video, Ollie breaks out the 'GCN Does Science' glasses and takes a deep dive into the physics of drafting, and how it actually works. Subscribe to GCN+ for cycling as you have never seen it before! On this week's GCN Tech show, Ollie & Alex hear from GCN's resident Fashion expert: Adam Blythe, and the true king of aero: Dan Bigham to see whether speed or style is more important. description: Why don't we use E-Motorbikes when we shoot GCN Videos? What's the ideal depth for an aerodynamic wheel rim? Can you put sealant in an inner tube? description: One of the best things about cycling is the social aspect of the sport. Riding with a group of like minded cyclists, chatting whilst you ride, and enjoying each other's company at the Cafe stop sets bike riding apart from other sports. But what if you've just moved to a new area, or just got into cycling, and you don't have any friends to ride with? Well, in this video, Hank and Manon share their top tips to help you find people to cycle with! description: The Tour of Flanders is a huge event and one of the biggest races on the pro cycling calendar. A long parcours and plenty of rough cobbles to contend with means the risk of crashes and mechanical issues is high and, with each team only having 2 cars in the convoy, the task of getting riders back on the road is often left to the neutral support vehicles. We sent Florian from GCN En Fran√ßais to ride along with the Shimano team at this year's RVV to see how their race unfolded! description: E-Bikes are rapidly increasing in popularity for a variety of reasons, from allowing those who aren't as fast as others to get out on group rides, to replacing the car for a short commute. They get more people into cycling and that's a win in our book! But just how fast can they be? In a previous video Hank managed to beat his dad, George, who was riding an E-Bike but hadn't ridden a bike in 20 years. We decided it was high time for a rematch, but this time George had an ace up his sleeve - he would be riding a de-restricted Canyon Grail On E-Bike to give Hank a proper test and see who would come out on top! description: Campagnolo have just released their new WTO range of wheels! The Italian brand's new wind tunnel optimised, disc brake only wheels are reportedly the fastest they've ever made! description: Diet, fuelling and nutrition are extremely important for your performance out cycling on your bike.
